The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 13 January is 27,830 (3,221.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 January, there were 5,844 new confirmed cases (676.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 January, there were 5,573 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (271 extra cases).
